long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin was created in order to give the searches a more social approach to the end users, so that when you search for some info in one of the majos engines like (google, yahoo, bing,yandex, baidu) if other users search for the same as you, you can check the info the share, try a chat or share your own info so that others can see it.

We think that the human being is the best link and so we create this plugin to attach the links provided a human approach to the info they have.
long.en_US: Kakuy is a search engine (unconventional) which works from the rest of the search engines (Google, Yahoo!, Yandex, Bing and Baidu) connecting users of those search engines who at that moment are doing the same search, allowing them to exchange and contrast the information found. Moreover, KakuyLive makes searches more social because unlike the current search engines that limit social search to the members of a social network, and within this to the user's contacts; Kakuy understands that the largest social network in the world is the Internet and contacts are all its users.
